title: What it's like helping newly arrived Venezuelan migrants in Florida
content:
What it's like helping newly arrived Venezuelan migrants in Florida NPR's Ayesha Rascoe speaks with Felipe Sousa-Lazaballet, executive director of HOPE Community Center near Orlando, which helps newly arrived migrants in Florida.
National What it's like helping newly arrived Venezuelan migrants in Florida What it's like helping newly arrived Venezuelan migrants in Florida Listen · 6:32 6:32 NPR's Ayesha Rascoe speaks with Felipe Sousa-Lazaballet, executive director of HOPE Community Center near Orlando, which helps newly arrived migrants in Florida.
